overview:
Poya Golriz is the Chief Operating Officer and Co-founder of Snoozester Inc. He is in charge of development of systems and applications as well as defining the roadmap for the company’s vision. Mr. Golriz also serves on the Snoozester board of directors.

Prior to Snoozester, Mr. Golriz was involved in various Internet start-ups in the late 90’s and early 2000’s. In the past 10 years, Mr. Golriz has done consulting work for many organizations in the Washington D.C. Metropolitan area. He has extensive experience in full life-cycle systems and application analysis, design, development, implementation, integration, deployment, and maintenance. His areas of expertise include application development, business development, project management, usability, and systems integration.
